item.title: Acquisition Gateway GSA
item.description: The Acquisition Gateway is your workspace for acquisition professionals and federal buyers to connect with resources, tools and each other to improve acquisition government-wide. This website is built in Drupal 7 and AngularJS, in a progress decoupled architecture. Aside from regular updates and changes, I have enhanced search functionality, developed custom modules to remove duplicate taxonomy and to create organic groups based on taxonomy. Project URL: https://hallways.cap.gsa.gov Technologies Used : Drupal, Apache Solr, Github, Amazon AWS, AngularJS.
